news_header: FSB arrests four individuals near Russia-Finland border; none are Russian.
news_original_title: Venäläismediat: Venäjän rajavartijat ottivat keskiviikkona kiinni neljä Suomeen pyrkinyttä
news_text: The Russian security service FSB arrested four people near the Russia-Finland border, with reports indicating they were attempting to reach Finland. None of the detainees are Russian. Video footage shows them lying on the ground with Russian border guards present. The Southeast Finnish Border Guard has not commented on the incident.
